project_title: Cardiovascular Function and Electrocardiographic Changes in Smokers and Non-Saokers in Response to Maximal Treadmill Exercise.
purpose: The maxisal treadmill exercise responses of approximately 900 clinically normal males between 25.and 55 years of age will be studied to determine if there are any significant differences between cigarette smokers and non-smokers.
parameters_to_compare: 3. Systolic blood pressure during maximal exercise testing.
4. Incidence of arrhythmias during maximal exercise testing.
5. Differences in the computer quantitated changes in the ST segment slope and depression in response to maximal exercise.
